alert.note: Alert for Western Chelan County (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 19 at 5:48PM PST until February 20 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Snow accumulations between 15 and 24 inches along the Cascade Crest with 10 to 15 inches elsewhere. * WHERE...Holden Village, Stehekin, and Stevens Pass. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snowfall rates of 1 to 2 inches per hour will be likely this evening and early Sunday morning leading to rapid increases in snow accumulation.
info.instruction: Motorists should be prepared for winter driving conditions at Stevens Pass tonight. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
